oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: =enn (Klaas Paai)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names of three Bushmen and another Native, who were at the Breakwater Convict Station in 1875, together with a little information regarding them. Taken down in English (L V.-19. 5445-5447, 5453-5456). =enn (Klaas Paai) provides Lloyd with some personal details and the names of some of his closest relations, including his wife and parents. 1) This story is found in Book V-19.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Klaas Paai or =enn (at Breakwater)
